ISSUE.TITLE: Add Instagram to default social media links
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Let's add a new social network to admin area > configuration > general settings > Social media block. The field (input) name will be "Instagram URL" and the hint will be "Specify your Instagram page URL. Leave empty if you have no such page." No default value is required during the installation. Then display this block in public store (if a page URL is entered). We can use the same [sprite image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Themes/DefaultClean/Content/images/social-sprite.png) but replace [removed](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/3597) g+ icon to the instagram one. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/40409/instagram-url.aspx?p=2#242498 See also: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/2087

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3997 Add Instagram to default social media links (#6112)
